Package com.example.services

Interface ReimbursementRequestsService

All Known Implementing Classes:
ReimbursementRequestsServiceImpl
public interface ReimbursementRequestsService
Interface to implement business logic related to Reimbursement Requests Provides methods for - 1. Retrieving reimbursement requests based on travel request ID 2. Retrieving reimbursement requests based on reimbursement request ID 3. Adding reimbursement requests 4. Updating reimbursement requests
Author:
Kalash Vishwakarma
